answers.answer: Most doctors won't schedule you another U/S, some do a routine growth scan at the end, but most don't unless there's something wrong or you're having medical issues. With boys it's usually MUCH easier to tell, it's pretty hard for them to hide their "things" maybe buy some gender neutral stuff or ask your doctor if you'll get another U/S
